task.title: Configuring search domains by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators can configure the search domains of by using the Network Settings page in the .

context.p: You can configure search domains by using the , or by using the command line. For more information about using the command line to configure search domains, see .

step.cmd: Go to the Network Settings page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: From the Home tab, click Network Settings in the Customize appliance settings pane.
From the Appliance menu, click Network Settings.

step.cmd: From the Search Domain table, choose an action:

choices.choice: To add a domain, click the Add icon.
To delete a domain, select the domain and click the Delete icon.
To edit a domain, select the domain and click the Edit icon.
To change the order of the domains, select a domain and click the Arrow icons.
